subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Traffic Accidents and Safety
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Before Jan Bakelants of Belgium won Stage 2 in Corsica, a bus driver who had become stuck at the Stage 1 finish received support from colleagues.
snippet: Before Jan Bakelants of Belgium won Stage 2 in Corsica, a bus driver who had become stuck at the Stage 1 finish received support from colleagues.
